thread.title: More than a million people in the Dnipropetrovsk region are now left without heat and water after a massive attack, said the Minister of Community and Territorial Development Alexei Kuleba

title: More than a million people in the Dnipropetrovsk region are now left without heat and water after a massive attack, said the Minister of Community and Territorial Development Alexei Kuleba
text: More than a million people in the Dnipropetrovsk region are now left without heat and water after a massive attack, said the Minister of Community and Territorial Development Alexei Kuleba More than a million people in the Dnipropetrovsk region are now left without heat and water after a massive attack, said the Minister of Community and Territorial Development Alexei Kuleba.
